mapper.select: SELECT statistics_id as statisticsId , statistics_name as statisticsName , chart_type as chartType , json_data as jsonData , insert_user_id as insertUserId , insert_datetime as insertDatetime , update_user_id as updateUserId , update_datetime as updateDatetime FROM isaver.statistics ORDER BY insert_datetime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE isaver.statistics SET statistics_name = #{statisticsName}, chart_type = #{chartType}, json_data = #{jsonData}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_datetime = NOW() WHERE statistics_id = #{statisticsId};
